testcase.name: Bank manager Login and exit
testcase.system-out: Given User is on Home Page..................................................passed When User clicks on Bank manager Login......................................passed Then User lands on bank manager Page with Add Customer , Open Account , Customers buttons available.passed When User clicks on home and will land on Home Page.........................passed

testcase.name: Customer Login and Logout
testcase.system-out: Given User is on home Page..................................................passed When User clicks on Customer Login..........................................passed Then User Selects "Hermoine Granger" and clicks Login.......................passed Then It will "Hermoine Granger" User Name and Account Details...............passed When User clicks Logout.....................................................passed Then It will go back to user select page....................................passed Then User clicks on home and land on Home Page..............................passed

testcase.name: Customer Login and Logout 2
testcase.system-out: Given User is on home Page..................................................passed When User clicks on Customer Login..........................................passed Then User Selects "Harry Potter" and clicks Login...........................passed Then It will "Harry Potter" User Name and Account Details...................passed When User clicks Logout.....................................................passed Then It will go back to user select page....................................passed Then User clicks on home and land on Home Page..............................passed
